There appears to be a pretty basic bug in the current (as of Apr 9, 2007) download of CompositeTable.  InternalCompositeTable.currentRow() is attempting rows.get(-1) in a variety of circumstances.  In other words, the currentRow variable is getting set to -1 somehow, and this state is not being handled properly.

The easiest way to reproduce this is to run one of the snippets 2-6 and attempt to scroll using the scroll arrows or thumb.  Clicking the down arrow in Snippet5 produces this stack dump:
